testsuite.test:
Verify Preconditions
Instructions: 1) Make sure all the preconditions listed are met. They will be required by upcoming tests. 2) Copy the folder 'test-photo' into the photo directory on the phone. (The exact name of the destination folder may vary on your device.) 3) Click 'GO' to start testing.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

1 copyFile Copy virtual photos test photo test txt
Instructions: Make sure the file '/virtual/photos/test-photo/test.txt' exists.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

2 copyFile Verify that copied file exists
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

copyFile Copy a directory
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

copyFile Copy a directory again destination exists should throw INVALID PARAMETER
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

1 deleteFile Verify that it returns true
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

2 deleteFile Verify that file doens t exist anymore
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

3 deleteFile Check that deleting again throws exception
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

1 deleteFile Apply it on a path
Instructions: Make sure an empty directory '/virtual/photos/test-photo/testdir' exists.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

2 deleteFile path Verify that path doens t exist anymore
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

3 deleteFile Check that deleting again throws exception
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

findFiles onFilesFound Search for fileName jpg
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

findFiles onFilesFound Search for pathName virtual fileName jpg
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

findFiles onFilesFound Search for pathName virtual photos fileName jpg
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

findFiles onFilesFound Search for pathName fileName jpg
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

getDirectoryFileNames Read from path virtual photos
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

getDirectoryFileNames Read from path virtual
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

getDirectoryFileNames Find directory virtual photos test photo testdir
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

getDirectoryFileNames Using invalid directory should throw ExceptionTypes INVALID PARAMETER
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

getFile An invalid file should throw INVALID PARAMETER
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

getFile File Verify properties of Widget Device File object
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

getFile File Verify types of properties of Widget Device File object
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

getFileSystemRoots Verify that an array is returned
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

getFileSystemSize Read sizes of all fileSystemRoots
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.
